verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I'm singing wonderful, wonderful,
Every day, in the way,
Wonderful, wonderful is He,
For He has rescued me, set me free,
Lifted me gloriously;
Wonderful, wonderful is He.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
For I've come out of the valley
Where the darkness abounds,
And I'm up on the mountain
Where the glory is found.
This my song, all day long,
In the night, through the fight,
Wonderful, wonderful is He.
